title: 5-Minute Mug Omelet
summary: Perfect microwave omelet ready in just 5 minutes.
instructions: Grease a microwave-safe mug with butter.
Crack eggs into the mug and whisk with milk.
Add cheese, ham or vegetables, salt, and pepper.
Microwave on high for 90 seconds.
Stir gently and microwave for another 45-60 seconds.
Let cool for 1 minute before eating.
Serve directly from the mug or turn out onto a plate.

title: One-Pan Chicken & Rice
summary: Complete one-pan meal with minimal cleanup required.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Season chicken with salt, pepper, and paprika.
Cook chicken for 5 minutes per side until golden. Remove and set aside.
Add onion and pepper to the same pan, cook for 3 minutes.
Add rice and stir for 1 minute.
Pour in broth and bring to a boil.
Return chicken to pan, reduce heat, cover and simmer for 12 minutes.
Let rest 5 minutes before serving.

title: 3-Ingredient Pancakes
summary: Simple pancakes with just banana, eggs, and oats.
ingredients: Honey or maple syrup for serving
instructions: Mash banana in a bowl until smooth.
Beat in eggs until well combined.
Stir in oats and cinnamon if using.
Let batter rest for 2 minutes.
Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake into the pan.
Cook for 2-3 minutes until bubbles form, then flip.
Cook for another 1-2 minutes until golden.

title: Lightning Ramen Upgrade
summary: Transform instant ramen into a gourmet meal in minutes.
instructions: Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions, drain and set aside.
In the same pot, add a little water and bring to simmer.
Crack egg into simmering water and poach for 3 minutes.
Remove egg and set aside.
Add garlic and spinach to pot, cook until wilted.
Return noodles to pot with sesame oil and soy sauce.
Transfer to bowl and top with poached egg.
Garnish with spring onions and drizzle with sriracha.

title: Speedy Caprese Grilled Cheese
summary: Gourmet grilled cheese with mozzarella, tomato, and basil.
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place one slice butter-side down in a cold pan.
Layer with mozzarella, tomato, basil, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze.
Top with second bread slice, butter-side up.
Cook over medium heat for 3 minutes until golden.
Flip and cook another 2-3 minutes until cheese melts.
Slice and serve immediately.
